name: Watermelon Serpentine Silver Necklace
description:
Hand forged, free-form abstract silver necklace, featuring a beautiful Watermelon Serpentine cabochon stone.

Metal:  .999 fine silver (pendant) .925 sterling silver (chain)

Necklace hangs approximately 12" from the neck.

Stone Measurements:  42x22x7mm

Stone Origin:  Wolf Chrome Mine, Texas, Pennsylvania

name: Green Onyx & White Quartz Doublet Silver Stacking Ring
description:
A petite stackable ring, featuring a 4mm green onyx/white quartz doublet cabochon stone.  Ring shank is delicate beaded silver wire.

Metal:  .925 sterling silver

Ring Size:  Made to order

RING SIZE GUIDE:

Don't know your ring size? Wrap a length of string around your finger and mark where the end touches. Measure the distance between the end of the string and the mark you've made, then consult the guide below to determine which size ring will fit you best:

2.04 in/51.5 mm = Size 6 
2.09 in/52.8 mm = Size 6.5 
2.15 in/54.0 mm = Size 7 
2.20 in/55.3 mm = Size 7.5 
2.25 in/56.6 mm = Size 8 
2.30 in/57.8 mm = Size 8.5

-Encourages self love 
-Heals emotional body 
-Eases heartache

name: Petite Square Silver & Turquoise Drop Earrings
description:
One half inch, slightly cupped sterling silver squares, oxidized in the center to darken the metal and highlight a beautiful 6mm turquoise cabochon stone.  Suspended from sterling silver french ear wires.

Metal:  .925 Sterling Silver

name: Alunite Sterling Silver Cuff Bracelet
description:
Hand forged sterling silver cuff, featuring a red and cream Alunite cabochon stone.  

Metal:  .925 sterling silver

Measurements:  Cuff measures approximately 8" in circumference and is somewhat pliable; it can be gently bent to fit the wrist. The stone measures 30 x 20 x 3.75mm.

Stone Origin:  Arizona

name: Peridot, Moonstone & Green Onyx Stud Earrings
description:
These petite stud earrings are comprised of genuine peridot, moonstone, and green onyx/white quartz doublet cabochon stones, set in sterling silver.  They are post-backed with .925 sterling silver posts.  The earrings measure approximately 1/4".

Peridot & Green Onyx/White Quartz stones measure 4mm, and the Moonstone measures 5mm.

name: Hammered Silver & Turquoise Earrings
description:
Hand stamped and oxidized for texture, these sterling silver earrings are oval in shape and feature a light turquoise bead suspended from each.  Sterling silver french ear wires.

Metal:  .925 Sterling Silver

Measurements:  Earrings hang pproximately 2" from ear lobe.

name: Amethyst Silver Circle Drop Earrings
description:
5mm deep purple, amethyst gemstones, set in slightly cupped Argentium Sterling Silver discs, measuring 5/8" and suspended from .925 sterling silver French ear wires.  Discs are oxidized to achieve a dark grey hue, a beautiful contrast to the purple stones.

Argentium Sterling Silver is a modern sterling silver alloy which modifies the traditional alloy (92.5% silver + 7.5% copper) by replacing some of the copper with the metalloid germanium.  As it retains the 92.5% silver content of the traditional alloy, it is still referred to as sterling silver.

name: Dalmatian Jasper Sterling Silver Statement Ring
description:
A triangular Dalmatian Jasper cabochon stone, in a sterling silver, plain bezel setting.  Ring shank is decoratively stamped.

Metal:  .925 sterling silver

Finish:  Brushed/Light Shine

Ring Size:  7

Stone:  49 x 26 x 5mm / Origin:  Mexico

RING SIZE GUIDE:

Don't know your ring size? Wrap a length of string around your finger and mark where the end touches. Measure the distance between the end of the string and the mark you've made, then consult the guide below to determine which size ring will fit you best:

name: Frida Kahlo Sugar Skull Calaveras Earrings
description: Inspired by Frida sugar skull/calaveras earrings.  The skulls are base metal and the ear wires are silver plated.  The earrings measure approximately 1" in length.

name: Script Stone Sterling Silver Pendant Necklace
description:
Also known as India Script Stone or Mariam Jasper, this material is believed to be fossilized shells in mud. The stone contains hues of rust, orange and dark brown.

Metal:  .925 sterling silver

Chain:  2.7mm wide sterling silver curb chain with lobster clasp

Stone: Measures approx. 28 x 22.5 x 4mm; its origin is India

Pendant measures approx. 12.5in in length

name: Silver Druzy Quartz Necklace
description:
A sparkling deep silver druzy quartz in a free form asymmetrical setting, lightly textured.

Metal:  .999 fine silver

Chain:  1mm wide, 18" long, .925 sterling silver curb chain

Measurements:  Stone measures 11x12mm; the pendant is approximately .5" in length

This is a natural quartz druzy and is colored with a dichro that gives the druzy stunning sparkle.

name: Alunite & Fancy Jasper Sterling Silver Necklace
description:
A striking alunite cabochon stone in a plain bezel setting.  Forest green Fancy Jasper stones are suspended from the bottom with sterling silver curb chain.  

Stone:  Alunite from Arizona, hues of deep red and cream, measures 28 x 29 x 3mm.

Metal:  .925 Sterling Silver

Measurements:  Main piece measures 1.5" x 1.5".  The 2.7mm wide sterling silver curb chain hangs 15" from the neck and hooks with a lobster clasp.

name: Silver Druzy Quartz Teardrop Earrings
description:
11x11mm bright silver druzy quartz in a teardrop style earring.  This is a natural quartz druzy and is colored with a dichro that gives the druzy its stunning sparkle. 

These earrings are suspended from french ear wires and measure approximately 2.5" in length.

Metal:  .999 fine silver and .925 sterling silver

Finish:  High Polish

Finish:  Brushed/Matte

name: Silver Free Form Drop Earrings
description:
These one-of-a-kind earrings were made by melting down silver scrap pieces and hammering it into asymmetrical shapes, which I then soldered together, adding 18 gauge wire to loop through the ear hole.

Metal:  .925 sterling and .999 fine silver

Measurements:  Approximately 2" in length

Finish:  Light polish

name: Frida Kahlo Quote Sterling & Suede Bracelet
description:
This sterling silver bracelet features a quote in Spanish by Frida Kahlo - "Pies, para que los quiero si tengo alas para volar" (Feet, what do I need them for when I have wings to fly.") 

*One size fits most (suede cord wraps around and ties in the back) 

*Cord color can be swapped out for black, rust, turquoise, natural tan, or red - please specify in options.

*This is a custom order:  Please allow 2-3 days plus shipping

name: Customizable Hand Stamped Sterling Silver Quote Bracelet
description:
Hand stamped on 1" x 0.5" 18 gauge .925 sterling silver.  Choose from the following quotes, or create your own by purchasing "CUSTOM STAMPING" option and emailing me with your request:

-JAMAIS SANS TOI ("Never without you", in French)

-L'AMOUR INFINI  ("Boundless love", in French)

-AMOR SIN LIMITE ("Boundless love", in Spanish)

-I CARRY YOUR HEART (From the E.E. Cummings poem, "I Carry Your Heart With Me")

-LOVE NEVER FAILS (Corinthians 13)

-ALIS VOLAT PROPRIIS ("She flies with her own wings", in Latin)

-AMOR VINCIT OMNIA ("Love conquers all", in Latin)

-BE THE CHANGE

-BOUNDLESS LOVE

-OM NAMAH SHIVAYA

Each bracelet has two loops soldered onto the back to secure the cord.  Choose your cord color from the listed options.  Cord measures 17" in length, but a longer length can be ordered by request at no extra charge.

This is a custom order, please allow 2 days for processing, in addition to shipping.

name: Gift Certificate
description:
Gift certificates are two-sided, listing both the website address of the shop, and a contact email address.  They arrive in a white envelope with a Charity Poole Design logo sticker.

Gift certificates can be shipped directly to you, or to the recipient.  Please specify in notes at PayPal checkout if the certificate should be made out to a specific name, or left blank, and be sure to list the correct mailing address if not being shipped to you as the buyer.

name: Rose Quartz Sterling Silver Statement Ring
description:
This ring makes a BIG statement...yes, it is huge.  Handcrafted from sterling silver and set with a beautiful rose quartz, embellished with silver bead detailing on either side.  A truly unique piece!

Stone measurements:  40x30mm

Ring size:  7

Metal:  .925 sterling silver

Finish:  Brushed/Matte

Did you know that rose quartz has spiritual and healing properties?

-Encourages self love
-Heals emotional body
-Eases heartache
-Relieves loneliness
-Releases repressed hurts
-Promotes forgiveness
-Offers inner peace

RING SIZE GUIDE:

Don't know your ring size? Wrap a length of string around your finger and mark where the end touches. Measure the distance between the end of the string and the mark you've made, then consult the guide below to determine which size ring will fit you best:

2.04 in/51.5 mm = Size 6 
2.09 in/52.8 mm = Size 6.5 
2.15 in/54.0 mm = Size 7 
2.20 in/55.3 mm = Size 7.5 
2.25 in/56.6 mm = Size 8 
2.30 in/57.8 mm = Size 8.5

name: Tibetan Turquoise Silver Square Statement Ring
description:
A beautiful ocean blue Tibetan turquoise square cabochon stone, set in a plain bezel.  Ring shank is embellished with sterling silver discs.

Metal:  .999 Fine Silver

Finish:  Brushed/Matte

Ring Size:  6.5

Natural Tibetan Turquoise - weight 43.2 ct

Stone Size : 22.1 x 18.8 x 8.0 mm

RING SIZE GUIDE:

Don't know your ring size? Wrap a length of string around your finger and mark where the end touches. Measure the distance between the end of the string and the mark you've made, then consult the guide below to determine which size ring will fit you best:

2.04 in/51.5 mm = Size 6 
2.09 in/52.8 mm = Size 6.5 
2.15 in/54.0 mm = Size 7 
2.20 in/55.3 mm = Size 7.5 
2.25 in/56.6 mm = Size 8 
2.30 in/57.8 mm = Size 8.5

name: Cultured Freshwater Pearl Silver Flower Ring
description:
A feminine flower ring with a little edge.  A white 8mm cultured freshwater button pearl sits on a 18mm round disc of hammered silver.  Ring shank is a sturdy 12 gauge round wire. 

Metal:  .999 fine silver (disc)  .925 sterling silver (ring shank)

Finish:  Polished

Ring Size:  7

name: Black Onyx Silver Square Ring
description:
A 8mm square black onyx cabochon in a bezel setting, sits on a sterling silver rectangle embellished with two silver beads on either side.  Ring shank is a solid 12 gauge sterling silver wire.

Metal:  .925 sterling silver

Finish:  Matte/Brushed

Size:  7  (Cannot be resized)

RING SIZE GUIDE:

Don't know your ring size? Wrap a length of string around your finger and mark where the end touches. Measure the distance between the end of the string and the mark you've made, then consult the guide below to determine which size ring will fit you best:

2.04 in/51.5 mm = Size 6 
2.09 in/52.8 mm = Size 6.5 
2.15 in/54.0 mm = Size 7 
2.20 in/55.3 mm = Size 7.5 
2.25 in/56.6 mm = Size 8 
2.30 in/57.8 mm = Size 8.5

name: Indigo Blue Druzy Quartz Large Stone Ring
description:
This sparkling indigo blue druzy quartz makes a big statement.  Druzy is extremely popular, beloved for its unique layer of quartz crystals covering the surface.  This gorgeous stone is set in a .999 fine silver bezel.

*Fun fact:  Druzy quartz is said to aid in balancing and increasing energy.

*Ring Size:  7 (Not resizable)

*Stone Size:  Approximately 1.5" x 1"

*Ring Shank:  Wide band, .999 Fine Silver

*Finish:  High polish

name: Hammered Sterling Silver Rectangle Earrings
description:
Oblong rectangle earrings, hammered silver, 18 gauge wire loop (fits through standard ear piercing)

*Length: 3"

*Finish:  Matte

*Shipping within 1-2 business days of receiving payment. Custom orders (Made to Order) items require 1-2 extra days.

*Standard Shipping to U.S. Addresses: 
Orders are shipped via USPS First Class Mail with Delivery Confirmation and domestic delivery times range between 2-9 days.

*Standard Shipping to International Addresses:
Orders are shipped via USPS First Class International Mail and delivery times range between 10-21 business days.

*Please note that international buyers are responsible for any and all taxes, duties and customs charges that may apply.

* If you require expedited shipping, please contact me and I can ship your order Priority or Express Mail for an extra fee.

name: Sonoran Dendritic Rhyolite Stone & Silver Necklace
description:
This beautiful earth-toned oblong stone is a Sonoran Dendritic Rhyolite.  It is set in a simple fine silver bezel setting, and strung from a sterling silver chain with a lobster clasp.  This classic modern piece is a one-of-a-kind design, sure to catch everyone's eye.

*Pendant Measurements: 3.5" wide x 1.25" long

*Necklace length:  10.25"

*Pendant crafted with .999 Fine Silver

name: Purple Druzy Quartz Fine Silver Pendant / Necklace
description:
A beautiful, round sparkling druzy quartz stone set in fine silver, embellished with six silver beads on each side.  The stone is purple with gray tones.

*Measurements:  Pendant measures approximately 0.75" wide x 0.75" long

*Bezel is made with .999 fine silver, small silver beads are sterling.

*Comes on either an 18" or 20" sterling silver chain.  Please specify at check out.

*Fun fact: Druzy quartz is said to aid in balancing and increasing energy.

name: Lavender Freshwater Cultured Pearl Sterling Silver Ring
description:
This classic modern ring features a beautiful lavender freshwater cultured pearl fitted onto a slightly cupped 25.4mm sterling silver disc.  The disc is patinated to achieve a dark gray/black color in the disc and really highlight the beautiful pearl.

*Size 7

*Finish:  Polished

*Ring shank:  wide

name: Sterling Silver & Red Bamboo Coral Earrings
description:
Lovely and original sterling silver earrings created with varied sized circular, slightly cupped discs. Suspended from the bottom are 8mm dyed red bamboo coral beads. 

*Patinated with "black max" to achieve the black color in the dish. 

*The reverse side is brushed matte silver. 

*The earrings measure 2" long.

name: Moonstone Sterling Silver Stud Earrings
description:
These post back earrings are great for every day wear, simple and elegant.

*Measurements: 11mm (approximately 0.43 inches) with a 5mm ( .19 inches) moonstone. 

*These earrings are made to order.  Please allow 2-3 days plus shipping.
